skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: color sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
RELAXING SLEEP SOUNDS: COLOR SOUNDS plays your choice of White, Blue, Pink or Brown Noise, and helps you decide which to use. 

WHY CHOOSE RELAXING SLEEP SOUNDS: COLOR SOUNDS
- 5 hour enhanced looping included FREE!
- High-Quality Stereo audio included for FREE (Premium Quality)!
- Not sure the difference between colors? We will help you pick the best one for you!
Please consider rating Relaxing Sleep sounds, if you have any sound recommendations, feedback or questions please contact me at relaxingsleep.alexa@gmail.com

If you enjoy this Sleep Sound Skill please check out my others!
- Relaxing Sleep Sounds: Rain Sounds
- Relaxing Sleep Sounds: Thunderstorms
- Relaxing Sleep Sounds: Ocean Sounds
- Relaxing Sleep Sounds: Fan Sounds
- Relaxing Sleep Sounds: Random Sleep Sounds
- Relaxing Sleep Sounds
